title: @Riot Summoner Name Change question.
body:
I've Read the full Summoner Name Change FAQ, but i've been wondering something.
If i change my name to something on the NA Servers and a player from like... EUW for a example with a similiar name (that has been taken before me) suddenly thinks of changing to the NA servers, will i loose my Summoner name (Turning it into a Temp name untill i buy another Summoner name change) ? 

And if the person in EUW don't change servers, will i be able to keep the name similiar/same?

Just curious that i don't waste money on changing my Summoner Name if someone on the other server's have the same name as i do.

PS. Sorry if this is in the wrong Sub-Category, wasn't sure if to ask here or in Miscellaneous.

replies.body:
Summoner names are only held on the server they are registered to. In other words, if a "Chibikaze" from EUW tried to transfer to NA, the system will notice the name is taken by you, and prompt them to select something else. 

As long as you stay active on your NA account, you shouldn't need to worry about someone sniping it from you!

>
> Summoner names are only held on the server they are registered to. In other words, if a "Chibikaze" from EUW tried to transfer to NA, the system will notice the name is taken by you, and prompt them to select something else. 
> 
> As long as you stay active on your NA account, you shouldn't need to worry about someone sniping it from you!

Oh that's a relief. Thank you!
